page.title: 13Housing
page.content: Nicholas's house. My house is on a hill on the edge of town.It is part of a terrace.There is a good view of the town from the front of the house.The house is made of red brick & has a slate roof.In front is a small garden with grass & flowers.It is about 80 years old.Inside the front door there is a long passage.On one side,to the left,there is a big sitting room.At the end of the passage is the living room.Beyond that there is a kitchen,pantry and a small room for the washing machine.Upstairs there are four bedrooms.The biggest bedroom is used as a playroom & has a snooker table in it.On this floor is also a bathroom & another little room.In the basement there is a cellar.The house is heated by gas central_heating.
